rukus.text: 20|2|apani kasta-klese patita hana – e jan'ya amara apanara prati kura'ana nayila karini [1]
20|3|baram ye bhaya kare tara jan'ya upadesa hisebe [1]
20|4|Yini yamina o samucca asamanasamuha srsti karechena tamra kacha theke eta nayilakrta
20|5|dayamaya (allah) arasera upara uthechena [1].
20|6|Ya ache asamanasamuhe o yamine ebam du’yera madhyabarti sthane o bhugarbhe [1] ta tamra'i.
20|7|Ara yadi apani uccakanthe katha balena, tabe tini to ya gopana o ati gopana ta saba'i janena [1].
20|8|Allah, tini chara an'ya kono satya ilaha ne'i, sundara namasamuha tamra'i [1].
20|9|Ara musara brttanta apanara kache paumcheche ki [1]

20|10|tini yakhana aguna dekhalena takhana tara paribarabargake balalena, ‘tomara apeksa kara, ami to aguna dekhechi. Sambhabata ami tomadera jan'ya ta theke kichu jbalanta angara anate parabo athaba ami agunera kache dhare kono pathanirdesa paba [1].
20|11|Tarapara yakhana tini agunera kache asalena takhana take deke bala hala, ‘he musa
20|12|‘niscaya ami apanara raba, ata'eba apanara juta jora khule pheluna, karana apani pabitra ‘tu'oya’ upatyakaya rayechena [1].
20|13|‘Ara ami apanake manonita karechi. Ata'eba ya ohi pathano hacche apani ta manoyogera sathe sununa.
20|14|‘Ami allah ami chara an'ya kono haka ilaha ne'i. Ata'eba, amara'i ibadata karuna [1] ebam amara smaranarthe salata adaya karuna [2].
20|15|‘Keyamata to abasyambhabi [1], ami eta gopana rakhate ca'i [2] yate pratyekake nija kaja anuyayi pratidana deya daya [3].
20|16|‘Kaje'i ye byakti kiyamate imana rakhe na ebam nija prabrtti anusarana kare, se yena apanake tara upara imana ana theke phiriye na rakhe, natuba apani dhbansa haye yabena [1].
20|17|Ara he musa! Apanara dana hate seta ki [1]?’
20|18|Musa balalena, ‘eta amara lathi; ami ete bhara de'i ebam era dbara aghata kare ami amara mesapalera jan'ya gachera pata phele thaki ara eta amara an'yan'ya kaje'o lage [1].’
20|19|Allah balena, ‘he musa! Apani ta niksepa karuna.’
20|20|Tarapara tini ta niksepa karalena, sange sange seta sapa [1] haye chutate lagala
20|21|allah balalena, ‘apani take dharuna, bhaya karabena na, amara etake tara agera rupe phiriye deba.
20|22|‘Ebam apanara hata apanara bagalera [1] sathe milita karuna, ta areka nidarsanasarupa nirmala ujjbala haye bera habe.
20|23|‘Eta e jan'ya ye, amara apanake amadera mahanidarsanagulora kichu dekhaba.
20|24|‘Phira’a'unera kache yana, se to simalanghana kareche [1].’
